name: SIM.L.M.
description:
SIM.L.M. takes the player through the process of starting their own multi-level marketing business. You'll get to experience all the defining parts of joining an MLM: Selling product, starting a team, dealing with haters, and more! 

99% of people who join an MLM will not recoup their initial investment (FTC). Although satirical in nature, it's our hope that this game brings awareness to the unethical business practices prevalent in multi-level marketing companies. 

How to Get a Friend Out of an MLM

Federal Trade Commission article explaining MLM structures
